languages.text: "Это не расправы. Это война с грехом и изменой, и в этой войне Инцендия Чорда наносит злу тяжелейшие раны".

traits.locale_text: "Это не расправы. Это война с грехом и изменой, и в этой войне Инцендия Чорда наносит злу тяжелейшие раны".

languages.text: "They aren't massacres. This is a war on apostasy and treason, and in this war, Incendia Chorda is inflicting grievous wounds upon the wicked."
languages.original_text: "Это не расправы. Это война с грехом и изменой, и в этой войне Инцендия Чорда наносит злу тяжелейшие раны".

traits.locale_text: "These aren't bloodbaths. This is war on sin and treason, and in this war, Incendia Chorda inflicts heavy wounds upon evil."
"These aren't bloodbaths. This is war on sin and treason, and in this war, Incendia Chorda inflicts heavy wounds upon evil."
"They aren't massacres. This is a war on sin and treason, and in this war, Incendia Chorda is inflicting grievous wounds upon evil."
"They aren't massacres. This is a war on sin and treason, and in this war, Incendia Chorda is inflicting grievous wounds upon evil."
"They aren't massacres. This is a war on apostasy and treason, and in this war, Incendia Chorda is inflicting grievous wounds upon the wicked."

languages.text: “那并不是大屠杀，而是对罪孽与叛国的宣战。在这场战争中，因森蒂娅·库尔达对邪恶势力造成了沉重的打击。”
languages.original_text: "They aren't massacres. This is a war on apostasy and treason, and in this war, Incendia Chorda is inflicting grievous wounds upon the wicked."

traits.locale_text: “那并不是大屠杀，而是对罪孽与叛国的宣战。在这场战争中，因森蒂娅·库尔达对邪恶势力造成了沉重的打击。”

languages.text: «No son masacres: es una guerra contra la apostasía y la traición. Una guerra en la que Incendia Chorda está infligiendo grandes golpes a los malvados».
languages.original_text: "They aren't massacres. This is a war on apostasy and treason, and in this war, Incendia Chorda is inflicting grievous wounds upon the wicked."

traits.locale_text: «No son masacres: es una guerra contra el pecado y la traición. Una guerra en la que Incendia Chorda está infligiendo grandes golpes al mal».

languages.text: 「大虐殺だなどとんでもない。これは背教と裏切りとの戦いであり、この戦においてインセンディア・チョーダは悪人に痛ましい傷を負わせております」
languages.original_text: "They aren't massacres. This is a war on apostasy and treason, and in this war, Incendia Chorda is inflicting grievous wounds upon the wicked."

traits.locale_text: 「大虐殺だなどとんでもない。これは背教と裏切りとの戦いであり、この戦においてインセンディア・チョーダは悪人に痛ましい傷を負わせております」

languages.text: "Das sind keine Massaker. Wir führen Krieg gegen Apostasie und Verrat, und in diesem Krieg fügt Incendia Chorda dem Bösen schwere Wunden zu."
languages.original_text: "They aren't massacres. This is a war on apostasy and treason, and in this war, Incendia Chorda is inflicting grievous wounds upon the wicked."

traits.locale_text: "Das sind keine Massaker. Wir führen Krieg gegen Sünde und Verrat, und in diesem Krieg fügt Incendia Chorda dem Bösen schwere Wunden zu."

languages.text: « Ce ne sont pas des massacres. Il s'agit d'une guerre contre l'apostasie et la trahison, et dans cette guerre, Incendia Chorda inflige de sérieuses blessures au mal. »
languages.original_text: "They aren't massacres. This is a war on apostasy and treason, and in this war, Incendia Chorda is inflicting grievous wounds upon the wicked."

traits.locale_text: « Ce ne sont pas des massacres. Il s'agit d'une guerre contre le péché et la trahison, et dans cette guerre, Incendia Chorda inflige de sérieuses blessures au mal. »

languages.text: "Bunlar katliam değil, dönekliğe ve hainliğe karşı verilen bir savaş. İncendia Chorda da bu savaşta kötülüğün bedeninde derin yaralar açıyor."
languages.original_text: "They aren't massacres. This is a war on apostasy and treason, and in this war, Incendia Chorda is inflicting grievous wounds upon the wicked."

traits.locale_text: "Bunlar katliam değil. Bu, dönekliğe ve hainliğe karşı verilen bir savaş ve bu savaşta İncendia Chorda, kötülüğün bedeninde derin yaralar açıyor."
